00028 template <typename T>
00029 struct TestGraph : CppUnit::TestFixture {
00030   // --------
00031   // typedefs
00032   // --------
00033 
00034   typedef T                                       graph_type;
00035 
00036   typedef typename graph_type::vertex_descriptor  vertex_descriptor;
00037   typedef typename graph_type::edge_descriptor    edge_descriptor;
00038 
00039   typedef typename graph_type::vertex_iterator    vertex_iterator;
00040   typedef typename graph_type::edge_iterator      edge_iterator;
00041   typedef typename graph_type::adjacency_iterator adjacency_iterator;
00042 
00043   typedef typename graph_type::vertices_size_type vertices_size_type;
00044   typedef typename graph_type::edges_size_type    edges_size_type;
00045 
00046   // -----
00047   // tests
00048   // -----
00049 
00050   graph_type g;
00051 
00052   vertex_descriptor vdA;
00053   vertex_descriptor vdB;
00054   vertex_descriptor vdC;
00055   vertex_descriptor vdD;
00056   vertex_descriptor vdE;
00057   vertex_descriptor vdF;
00058   vertex_descriptor vdG;
00059   vertex_descriptor vdH;
00060 
00061   edge_descriptor edAB;
00062   edge_descriptor edAC;
00063   edge_descriptor edAE;
00064   edge_descriptor edBD;
00065   edge_descriptor edBE;
00066   edge_descriptor edCD;
00067   edge_descriptor edDE;
00068   edge_descriptor edDF;
00069   edge_descriptor edFD;
00070   edge_descriptor edFH;
00071   edge_descriptor edGH;
00072 
00073   // -----
00074   // setUp
00075   // -----
00076 
00077   // directed, sparse, unweighted
00078   // possibly connected
00079   // possibly cyclic
00080   // Collins, 2nd, pg. 653
00081   void setUp () {
00082     vdA  = add_vertex(g);
00083     vdB  = add_vertex(g);
00084     vdC  = add_vertex(g);
00085     vdD  = add_vertex(g);
00086     vdE  = add_vertex(g);
00087     vdF  = add_vertex(g);
00088     vdG  = add_vertex(g);
00089     vdH  = add_vertex(g);
00090     edAB = add_edge(vdA, vdB, g).first;
00091     edAC = add_edge(vdA, vdC, g).first;
00092     edAE = add_edge(vdA, vdE, g).first;
00093     edBD = add_edge(vdB, vdD, g).first;
00094     edBE = add_edge(vdB, vdE, g).first;
00095     edCD = add_edge(vdC, vdD, g).first;
00096     edDE = add_edge(vdD, vdE, g).first;
00097     edDF = add_edge(vdD, vdF, g).first;
00098     edFD = add_edge(vdF, vdD, g).first;
00099     edFH = add_edge(vdF, vdH, g).first;
00100     edGH = add_edge(vdG, vdH, g).first;
00101   }
00102 
00103   // -------------
00104   // test_add_edge
00105   // -------------
00106 
00107   void test_add_edge () {
00108     std::pair<edge_descriptor, bool> p = add_edge(vdA, vdB, g);
00109     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(p.first  == edAB);
00110     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(p.second == false);
00111   }
00112 
00113   // -----------
00114   // test_vertex
00115   // -----------
00116 
00117   void test_vertex () {
00118     vertex_descriptor vd = vertex(0, g);
00119     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vd == vdA);
00120   }
00121 
00122   // ---------
00123   // test_edge
00124   // ---------
00125 
00126   void test_edge () {
00127     std::pair<edge_descriptor, bool> p = edge(vdA, vdB, g);
00128     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(p.first  == edAB);
00129     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(p.second == true);
00130   }
00131 
00132   // -----------------
00133   // test_num_vertices
00134   // -----------------
00135 
00136   void test_num_vertices () {
00137     vertices_size_type vs = num_vertices(g);
00138     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vs == 8);
00139   }
00140 
00141   // --------------
00142   // test_num_edges
00143   // --------------
00144 
00145   void test_num_edges () {
00146     edges_size_type es = num_edges(g);
00147     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(es == 11);
00148   }
00149 
00150   // -----------
00151   // test_source
00152   // -----------
00153 
00154   void test_source () {
00155     vertex_descriptor vd = source(edAB, g);
00156     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vd == vdA);
00157   }
00158 
00159   // -----------
00160   // test_target
00161   // -----------
00162 
00163   void test_target () {
00164     vertex_descriptor vd = target(edAB, g);
00165     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vd == vdB);
00166   }
00167 
00168   // -------------
00169   // test_vertices
00170   // -------------
00171 
00172   void test_vertices () {
00173     std::pair<vertex_iterator, vertex_iterator> p = vertices(g);
00174     vertex_iterator                             b = p.first;
00175     vertex_iterator                             e = p.second;
00176     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(b != e);
00177     vertex_descriptor vd = *b;
00178     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vd == vdA);
00179     ++b;
00180     vd = *b;
00181     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vd == vdB);
00182   }
00183 
00184   // ----------
00185   // test_edges
00186   // ----------
00187 
00188   void test_edges () {
00189     std::pair<edge_iterator, edge_iterator> p = edges(g);
00190     edge_iterator                           b = p.first;
00191     edge_iterator                           e = p.second;
00192     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(b != e);
00193     edge_descriptor ed = *b;
00194     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ed == edAB);
00195     ++b;
00196     ed = *b;
00197     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ed == edAC);
00198   }
00199 
00200   // ----------------------
00201   // test_adjacent_vertices
00202   // ----------------------
00203 
00204   void test_adjacent_vertices () {
00205     std::pair<adjacency_iterator, adjacency_iterator>
00206       p = adjacent_vertices(vdA, g);
00207     adjacency_iterator b = p.first;
00208     adjacency_iterator e = p.second;
00209     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(b != e);
00210     vertex_descriptor vd = *b;
00211     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vd == vdB);
00212     ++b;
00213     vd = *b;
00214     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(vd == vdC);
00215   }
00216 
00217   // --------------
00218   // test_has_cycle
00219   // --------------
00220 
00221   void test_has_cycle () {
00222     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(cs::has_cycle(g));
00223   }
00224 
00225   // ---------------------
00226   // test_topological_sort
00227   // ---------------------
00228 
00229   void test_topological_sort () {
00230     std::ostringstream out;
00231     cs::topological_sort(g, std::ostream_iterator<vertex_descriptor>(out, " "));
00232     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(out.str() == "2 0 1 ");
00233   }

00240   CPPUNIT_TEST(test_add_edge);
00241   CPPUNIT_TEST(test_vertex);

00243   CPPUNIT_TEST(test_num_vertices);
00244   CPPUNIT_TEST(test_num_edges);

00250   CPPUNIT_TEST(test_has_cycle);
00251   CPPUNIT_TEST(test_topological_sort);
00252   CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_END();
